entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h except 50 over exposed coastal sections this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
